definition: A vehicle typically used by a group of individuals who respond to emergencies involving flames, heat, and smoke. It is commonly employed to transport personnel, equipment, and water to extinguish fires and provide assistance during fire-related incidents.

examples.german: Das Feuerwehrauto fährt mit Blaulicht und Sirene zur Einsatzstelle.
examples.english: The fire truck drives with blue lights and siren to the scene of the incident.

examples.german: Das Feuerwehrauto hat eine große Wasserpumpe.
examples.english: The fire truck has a large water pump.

examples.german: Die Kinder waren begeistert, als das Feuerwehrauto vorbeifuhr.
examples.english: The children were excited when the fire truck drove by.

examples.german: Das Feuerwehrauto ist mit verschiedenen Werkzeugen ausgestattet.
examples.english: The fire truck is equipped with various tools.

examples.german: Das Feuerwehrauto hat eine Drehleiter, um Menschen aus höheren Stockwerken zu retten.
examples.english: The fire truck has an aerial ladder to rescue people from higher floors.
